entry.content:
Description

On the Capacitated Facility Location Problem with Scarce Resources Gennaro Auricchio, Harry J. Clough, Jie Zhang https://openreview.net/pdf?id=3tH77YyFTs

Inference in Probabilistic Answer Set Programs with Imprecise Probabilities via Optimization Damiano Azzolini, Fabrizio Riguzzi https://openreview.net/pdf?id=h5VFqO681Y

Generalized Expected Utility as a Universal Decision Rule -- A Step Forward Hélène Fargier, Pierre Pomeret-Coquot https://openreview.net/pdf?id=OeOZO9rZj3

Polynomial Semantics of Tractable Probabilistic Circuits Oliver Broadrick, Honghua Zhang, Guy Van den Broeck https://openreview.net/pdf?id=LKgqKbzZKA
